arg.name: lookup
arg.help: The allowed length of the identifier, described by a single org.xmlcml.euclid.IntRange (note there are no internal spaces). The default is `{1,*}` - any non-empty identifier - will be used if there is no `--id.length` attribute. When this attribute is present, the method `parseLength` will be called which saves the value of the `IntRange`.
